fields.summary: Optimize Boost dependency in build images
fields.description:
At least in the Windows Docker image, vspkg currently builds 171 packages the vast majority of which are varios boost modules and their dependencies.

Hadoop only uses a handful of those modules.

Optimize the Windows image by only installing the boost modules that Hadoop actually needs. This would save time, disk space, bandwidth.

This is less relevant in the Linux images, where the Boost build simply skips the parts with missing dependencies.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
